dev-1.x.name: drupal/gra4

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Big social networks put plenty of web communities out of commission - anyone can create a group on Facebook, and it's much easier than to build and support whole website. We want to get web-masters back into the game - with GRA4 any Drupal installation can get it's own full-blown social networking subsystem.

1.0.0.name: drupal/gra4

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Big social networks put plenty of web communities out of commission - anyone can create a group on Facebook, and it's much easier than to build and support whole website. We want to get web-masters back into the game - with GRA4 any Drupal installation can get it's own full-blown social networking subsystem.
